description: Package of domain/ip address lookup tools for Windows, including DomainHostingView, which creates extensive HTML report about the specified domain by using a series of DNS and WHOIS queries, WhoisThisDomain, which extracts the WHOIS record of the specified domain, IPNetInfo, which provides information about the specified IP address, DNSDataView, which displays the list of DNS records for the specified domain (Alternative to the NSLookup tool of Windows), and more...
